deungdutjaisNote: Ew. I really don‚Äôt care what two consenting adults do, but I do have to say that if my ex called me up, asked if I was still seeing the guy I was dating, then said ‚ÄúI just wanted to see your face‚Ä¶now show me what you‚Äôre wearing,‚Äù I‚Äôd block his number.
